abstract: On Thursday evening, Wyeth filed the agreement for its $68 billion takeover by Pfizer. As the press release on Monday hinted, the Wyeth-Pfizer deal offers a new model for strategic transactions.
lead_paragraph: On Thursday evening, Wyeth filed the agreement for its $68 billion takeover by Pfizer. As the press release on Monday hinted, the Wyeth-Pfizer deal offers a new model for strategic transactions.
